column1: Verse Text
Kwa muheshimiwa Th'eofilo. At'u anji majeza here madimazho kundhika garyahu maut'u ambago gahendeka kahikahi zehu.
At'u ao maora go hurigoambirwa ni ao mashudhia a maut'u gaga na mario pia were ni alimu a wo Uv̱oro.
Kwa vizho muheshimiwa Th'eofilo, kwa kukala mimi mwenye nami navichunguza zhosi na nikivithuwa t'ot'ot'o kula chaho, naona ni vidzo nami nikuorere t'ot'ot'o here maut'u garizhokala,
kwamba udime kumanya ujeri wosi wa maut'u urigofundishwa.

Bai wakathi muthawali Herode anathawala Judea, kwakala na mulombi ariyekala anaifwa Zakaria. Zakaria yuyu were anambola kahi za lukolo lwa kilombi lwa Abija. Muchewe were anaifwa Elizabeth'i kidza naye were anambola kahi za lukolo lwa kilombi lwa Haruni.
Osi airi, mut'u na muchewe were manaishi maisha ga kumufwahiza Mulungu, kidza were manazigwira amuri zosi na malagizo gosi ga Bwana hasiho kaila.
Ela ko were k'amana ahoho bule, kwani Elizabeth'i were ni t'asa, kidza visithoshe, osi airi were madzakala athumia jeri-jeri.
Vikara siku mwenga Zakaria were anaenderera na kaziye ya ulombi mumo kahi za ro Hekalu. Jaore kahi za maut'u ga ulombi were ndo ririro isani kahi za wakathi uwo,
Kwa vizho marihopiga k'urakulengana na adha rao, ikimugwerera Zakaria kwamba angire haryahu hat'u haeri kahi za ro Hekalu ra Bwana na afukize uvumba.
Vikara wakathi wa kufukiza uvumba urihofika, aryahu at'u angine osi makala manavoya ko ndze ya haryahu hat'u haeri.
Ndo hachambola malaika na akikala aungerere luhande lwa mukono wa kurya wa cho kijaja cha kufukizira uvumba.
K'uzhona zho Zakaria arihomona ye malaika wangalala na akikwatya kwadzalwa ni woga.
Kuona vizho, ye malaika akimwamba Zakaria, “Usogohe Zakaria! Kwani Mulungu adzasikira mavoyogo. Mucheo Elizabeth'i andakuzhalira muthana na undamwiha Johana.
Mwana yuyu andihozhalwa undahenda raha kidza undanyeth'a, na hatha anji angine mandahenda raha haho akizhalwa.
Kwani mwana yuyu andakala mut'u mubomu mbere za Bwana, kidza bai asinwe divai hedu kinywaji chochosi cha kurezha hatha vichache, na andadzala Roho Mweri hatha kabila k'adzazhalwa.
Mut'u yuyu andaahendya Aiziraeli anji mamuuyire Bwana Mulungu wao.

Kidza andamuthangulia Mulungu kahi za roho na nguvu here arizhokala Elija. Na lola andaahendya o ano biat'u madziomena ana ao, maahendze, na andaagaluza o at'u masiosikira makale na ulachu dza uryahu wa at'u enye hachi. Mut'u yuyu andamuthayarishira Mulungu at'u.”
Zakaria arihosikira vizho, akimuza ye malaika akiamba, “Ut'u uno be nindamanyadze ni wa jeri? Kwani mimi nidzakala muthumia na muchangu naye adzathumika.”
Ye malaika akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Mimi ni Gaburieli, nikalaye mbere za Mulungu kumuhumikira, nami nidzahumwa kwako nidze nikwambire uv̱oro uu udzo.

Ela ko udzawona uu uv̱oro wangu uriwo undathimira kwa wakathiwe kukala si wa jeri, na lola kwa kukala k'ugakuluhirire maneno gangu, be undafungika sauthi muhaka siku gandihothimira gaga nidzigokwambira.”
Wakathi uu o at'u mariokala manamuthariza Zakaria ambole madangana kwa viryahu arizhokala anatoa zhomu mo Hekaluni.

Bai arihombola akikala k'adima kunena nao bule, na o at'u marihoona vizho makimanya kare kukala suthi akale adzaona maono mo Hekaluni. Vikara kwa kukala were k'adima kunena wahenda kuap'a miv̱ano na yo mikonoye.
Zakaria waenderera kukala kahi za ro Hekalu muhaka zamuye ikigoma ndo akidziudzya kwakwe mudzini.
K'avitoere Elizabeth'i mukaza ye Zakaria akifunga mimba. Bai arihokala adzafunga mimba k'ambolere mo nyumbani hatha miezi mitsano pu.
Kidza akiamba, “Bwana adzanaviza kahi za ngira ii. Lola adzaniusira kusholerwa nirikokala nikisholerwa!”
Bai kahi za mwezi wa handahu wa mimba ya Elizabeth'i, Mulungu wamuhuma ye malaika Gaburieli muhaka mudzi mumwenga uifwao Nazareth'i kahi za jimbo ra Galilaya.
Mulungu wamuhuma ende kuko akalazhe uv̱oro kwa musichana mumwenga aifwaye Maryamu. Musichana yuyu were analolwa ni mut'u aifwaye Josefu, ariye were anambola kahi za lukolo lwa Daudi.
Kwa vizho ye malaika achenda kwa Maryamu na akiamba, “K'una ut'u? Mulungu a hamwenga nawe uwe, kidza adzakuhasa zhomu sana!”
Maryamu arihosikira maneno gago, wabudzyika mo moyoni mwakwe na akidziuza, “Ut'u uno be manaye ni noni?”
Ye malaika akimwamba, “Usogohe bule Maryamu, kwa kukala udzapata nema kwa Mulungu.
Na lola undafunga mimba na undazhala mwana mulume. Mwana yuyu undamup'a dzina umwihe Jesu.
Yuyu andakala mut'u mubomu kidza andaifwa Mwana wa Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi. Bwana Mulungu andamup'a kihi cha uthawali cha mukarewe Daudi.
Naye andakala muthawali wa Aiziraeli hatha kare na kare. Wo uthawaliwe be k'aundahenda mwisho bule.”
Kusikira vizho Maryamu akimwamba ye malaika, “Maut'u gano be gandakaladze, nami sidzakala na mulume?”

Ye malaika akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Roho Mweri andakudzirira, na kidza nguvu za Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi zindakufinikira dza here kivurivuri. Kwa ut'u uu bai, iye mwana andiyezhalwa andakala mueri, na andaifwa Mwana wa Mulungu.
Na lola yuyahu mumanyio Elizabeth'i naye andazhala mwana mulume idzaho adzakala muthumia. Ye ariyekala akiambwa ni t'asa, be lola vivi ana mimba ya miezi mihandahu,
mana k'akuna kisichodimikika kwa Mulungu.”
Kusikira vizho Maryamu akiamba, “Mimi ni muhumiki wa Mulungu, kwa vizho bai maut'u gaga naganikalire here udzizhoamba uwe.” Gonya ye malaika akimuhaukira ye Maryamu.
Bada ya gago, k'avitoere Maryamu achenda haraka kahi za kadzidzi kamwenga kariko kahi za mirima ya Judea.
Naye wakwenda hatha mudzini kwa Zakaria na achendamulamusa Elizabeth'i.
Iye Elizabeth'i arihosikira wo uvoro wa Maryamu thu, ye mwana mo ndanini akisumba zhomu zhenye na lola ye Elizabeth'i akidzalwa ni Roho Mweri.
K'uzhona zho Elizabeth'i akinena na sauthi bomu akimwamba Maryamu, “Uwe ndiwe udziyehaswa ni Mulungu kukira anaache osi na kidza adzahaswa iye mwana undiyemuzhala!
Ela be mino hatha be ni h'ani hatha ye mameye Bwana wangu anitsemberere?
Kwani lola nidzihosikira wo uvorowo thu, ye mwana mo ndanini mwangu adzasumba zhomu zhenye kwa fwahiro.
Bai haswa kwa kukala wakuluhira kukala go maneno arigokwambira ye Bwana gandathimira jeri.”
Ndo Maryamu akiamba,
Kidza roho yangu ina raha kwa ut'u wa Mulungu mwokoli wangu,
mana adzanionera mbazi
kwa ut'u wa go maut'u mabomu ambago ye Mulungu mwadimi adzanihendera.
Naye ana mbazi kwa ao mario manamwagoha,
Iye waugoloza wo mukonowe wa nguvu
Kidza waathinya athawali kula kahi za vihi zhao zha endzi,
Waakusha o enye ndzala na vit'u vidzo-vidzo,
Kidza iye vizho adzathimiza kilaganeche na akare ehu
Maryamu wakala na Elizabeth'i kuko kwa muda wa miezi mihahu vivi, ndo akiuya kwao mudzini.
Vikara wakathi urihofika wa ye Elizabeth'i kudzivugula, wahagwaga muthana.
Na lola majiranige na amanyie mafwahirwa naye marihosikira kukala Bwana adzamuonera mbazi nyinji na akamujalia Elizabeth'i mwana.
K'uzhona zho ye mutsanga arihofisha siku nane hakidza at'u kwamba mamwangize lwembeni, nao o at'u were madzapanga kumup'a dzina ra Zakaria ambaro ndo dzina ra babaye mwenye.
Ela ye mimut'u kusikira vizho akiamba, “Hatha bule! Dzinare yuyu andaifwa Johana.”
O at'u makimwamba, “Mbona kaheri, samba k'ahana mukwenu yoyosi aifwaye Johana?”
Ndo makiona baha mamuze ye bimut'u chamba angahendza ye mwana agerwe dzina rani. Kwa vizho makimuza kwa kuhenda kuhumira miv̱ano.
Bai ye bimut'u akilagiza agerwe kibao cha kuorera, na ye here kitai akiora vivi, “Dzinare nde Johana.” O at'u osi machangalala kamare.
Na haho henye sauthiye ikirichirwa na akikala anadima kunena kaheri, naye akimulika Mulungu.
O majirani ao osi makihondoka na lola kahi za mirima yosi ya Judea be were kila mut'u uv̱oro ni uu.
Kila mut'u ariyesikira uv̱oro uu wadziuza kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Muhoho yuno andakala muhoho wa samupuli yani?” Kwani were vi lwazu kamare kukala nguvu za Bwana zi hamwenga naye.
Gonya Zakaria, babaye Johana wadzalwa ni Roho Mweri na akinena maneno gaga ga Mulungu akiamba,
“Naalikwe Bwana Mulungu wa Iziraeli
Kidza wahurehera mwokoli mwenye nguvu
Here arizholaga haho kapindi
kwamba huthie kula kwa mahadhui ehu
Bai anaaonera mbazi o akare ehu
arichomulahira mukare wehu Burahemu
Kidza humuhumikire kahi za ngira
“Na uwe mwanangu, bai undaifwa nabii wa Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi kwani undamuthangulia Bwana kwamba umutengezere ngiraye,
na kidza uamanyise o at'u kukala Mulungu andaasamehe dambi zao na kwa ngira ii mandaokolwa.
Kwani Mulungu wehu ana mbazi nyinji na kukirira kwa zizo mbazize, dzuwa ra wokolwi rindahumbolera kula mulunguni.
Naro dzuwa riro rindaang'alira aryahu mario manaishi kizani na mario kahi za kivurivuri cha kifwa. Naro rindang'ala kwamba rilongoze nyayo zehu zizhoge kahi za ngira yendayo dherini.”
K'uzhona zho yuyahu muhoho akikula na akikala ana nguvu nyinji za kiroho. Lola mut'u yuyu wakala anatoa nyika muhaka uryahu wakathi wa kuambolera Aiziraeli lwazu-lwazu urihofika.
